article_title: Merced’s annual Cesar Chavez march to highlight farm labor
article_text:
Annual Cesar Chavez march is in its second year

Organizers said farmworkers are still exposed to dangerous chemicals

The march goes from downtown to South Merced park

article_metadata.news-keywords: merced, cesar, chavez, march, farmworkers, rights, labot, union, united farm workers
article_metadata.description: The Cesar Chavez Committee has again organized a march to continue the push for workers’ rights this weekend. The second annual march is 2 p.m. Sunday and begins at the intersection of M and 16th streets. The march is set to proceed to the McNamara Park Youth Center, where the celebration continues until 6 p.m.
article_metadata.title: Merced’s annual Cesar Chavez march to highlight farm labor | The Merced Sun-Star
